description: Ms. codex. Title from front flyleaf. Physical description: 20 lines per page; written in small nastaʻliq in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Leaf 15 detached. A few tears and repairs and mild staining. Origin: Likely first half of the 19th century. Incipit: والفقه في اللغة الفهم آه انما ابتدأ بتعرىف الفقه دون اصول الفقه کما هو المعروف فى کتب الاصول لان وضع الکتاب انما هو في اللغة
author: Shīrwānī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, -1687
abstract: Commentary on Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī's Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn, a treatise on uṣūl al-fiqh.
extent: 88 leaves : paper ; 201 x 138 (163 x 75) mm bound to 207 x 145 mm

title.@value: حاشية ملا مىرزا جان بر معالم الاصول.
Ḥāshiyat Mullā Mīrzā Jān bar Maʻālim al-uṣūl.

provenance: On front flyleaf, note dated Shawwāl 1346 H [March-April 1928].
creator: Shīrwānī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, -1687
شيرواني، محمد بن الحسن، -1687
subject: Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī, al-Ḥasan, 1551 or 1552-1602 or 1603—Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
